channel.title: Home on Luis Santos
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Luis Santos

item.title: FFCLJ
item.description: FFCLJ is a simple ffmpeg clojure wrapper. It aims to provide a simple wrapper around ffmpeg.

item.title: The Art of Innovation
item.description: Guy Kawasaki is a world known technology evangelist. In this video he talks about innovation and shares his TOP 10 thoughts on it. This is one of the best TED talks I’ve watched in the last few months. Video Slide deck

item.title: JVM performance and optimizations
item.description: What makes Java so great is not the language itself but the platform where it runs. The JVM is an amazing piece of software and can easily out perform platforms like C++ or GO.

item.title: About me
item.description: Passionate Technical Lead and Software developer I’m a passionate technical leader focused on building great products and leading great teams. I’ve architected and built horizontally scalable systems on Amazon Web Services and Microsoft Azure. I work with modern technology stacks such as JVM ( Java, Kotlin, Clojure ) Spring Boot, Kafka, and Kubernetes. Development Infrastucture and DevOps Leading Software and System Architecture Scrum and Agility

item.title: Credits
item.description: Credits Some pictures on this website were create by: https://unsplash.com/@rxspawn https://unsplash.com/@clarktibbs https://unsplash.com/@ameenfahmy_ https://unsplash.com/@andozo https://unsplash.com/@andrewtneel https://unsplash.com/@chrisliverani https://unsplash.com/@odiin https://unsplash.com/@glenncarstenspeters https://unsplash.com/@hbtography https://unsplash.com/@maltewingen https://unsplash.com/@marvelous https://unsplash.com/@parkkun https://unsplash.com/@rpnickson

item.title: Traveling
item.description: Travel is fatal to prejudice, bigotry, and narrow-mindedness. Mark Twain

item.title: To Do: A Checklist for Your Life
item.description: Now i’m almost turning 26 i will follow an advice and create a “To Do List” for my life. Some items i just Borrowed from other but i will keep adding my own.

item.title: Bella - Lorenzo Jovanotti Cherubini
item.description: E gira, gira il mondo e gira il mondo e giro te mi guardi e non rispondo perché risposta non c'è nelle parole Bella come una mattina d'acqua cristallina come una finestra che mi illumina il cuscino calda come il pane ombra sotto un pino mentre t'allontani stai con me forever Lavoro tutto il giorno e tutto il giorno penso a te e quando il pane sforno

item.title: A CISMA - Valsa do Desencontro
item.description: Quem foi que tocou a balada das ironias E me embalou o corpo em metáforas e paredes frias Matou a sede com eufemismos e lágrimas Deixou-me adormecer ao ombro o virar da página E se eu disser que o meu peito se gastou A raspar nos muros que a tua aura saltou Será que te vejo olhar para trás Quem foi que pintou a cidade em tons de luto

item.title: Random Access Memories - Giorgio by Moroder
Beirut - Elephant Gun
item.description: If I was young, I'd flee this town I'd bury my dreams underground As did I, we drink to die, we drink tonight

item.title: The Need 4 Speed: The Art of Flight
